price: 12. Alle Waa Kan idin tusa hillaaca cabsi iyo rajo gelin darteed, iyo (Kan) unka daruuro hogol ah oo biyo riman.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنشِئُ ٱلسَّحَابَ ٱلثِّقَالَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunshi-u al-saḥāba al-thiqāla
